xt:extension.xt:name: DITA Slides Presentation.

xt:description.h2: oXygen XML Editor framework which presents DITA sections as slides.
xt:description.p: A CSS layer which when enabled allows you to go through all sections inside a DITA topic in a sequential manner. Useful when presenting ideas directly from a DITA topic.
